titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, 3. 1. 1913
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 107; deutsch: Briefe, S. 24; Cambridge Letters, S. 22; WiC, S. 37).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your very kind letter. I thought of writing to you just before I got it to tell you that I will not be able to come over to England untill or after the beginning of term, there being all sorts of troubles at home. â€’ I excuse your slanging Philosophy as you were just coming from McTaggart & just thinking of me when you did it. I am very glad to heir that you had a good time.
